name: John Kelly
Comment: I’d love to share my thoughts on Omega - just love the business and we have rented since the mid to late 90’s. The slogan about being upfront truly reflects the core nature of the business and we have always had great service, and great value for money.

name: Tommy Shlug

name: Tommy Macguire
Comment: The Supra pushes all the right buttons for fun: eager powertrain, crisp handling and grin-inducing exhaust. Versus the competition: Its unique tuning gives the Supra a leg up on its

name: Mary Kelly
Comment: The Armada full-size SUV is quiet, comfortable (in the first two rows), well-equipped and easy to like, but you’ll have to overlook its dated media tech

name: Mr Farrelly
Comment: New styling and a boost to the wheelbase make the new X4 slightly less weird, decidedly more fun and marginally more desirable than before. Versus the competition:
